title: Ep 340 | Phil’s Neighbors Have a Run-In with the Law and Jase Tackles the Big Bang Theory
description:
Phil’s neighbors have a run-in with law enforcement. Zach shares his thoughts on "A Brief History of Time" by Stephen Hawking. Jase and Zach discuss an alternative explanation for the big bang. And Jase explains the difference between the Spirit being in, on, or upon you and explores why the Gospels chronicle the same story from multiple points of view.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
